snippet.title: Abyss First Open Playtest - Day 1
snippet.description:
Join us for a firsthand look at the exciting and sometimes chaotic world of Abyss during our latest playtest! We encountered some major challenges—players were literally falling through the Abyss, facing login issues, and dealing with a host of bugs that turned our starter zone into pure chaos.

🔥 What's Happening?
This was a free playtest, and we're dedicated to improving! We are actively listening to your feedback and making necessary changes.
Stay tuned early next week for a "Before and After" video showcasing the improvements based on your feedback.
More free playtests are scheduled throughout the year—don't miss out on the chance to help shape the world of Abyss!

🛠️ Current Top Bug Fixes:
Priority Fix: Preventing players from falling into the Abyss.
Login Issues: Strengthening our login servers for better accessibility.
Performance Tweaks: Addressing GPU load issues on certain setups.

🌐 Additional Fixes Underway:
World Mechanics: Adjusting gravity settings, spawn points, mob behaviors, and more.
Abilities: Refining hitboxes and effects for a smoother combat experience.
Character Model: Enhancing animations, mesh placements, and more for a more immersive character experience.
For a comprehensive list of all ongoing and planned fixes, check out our detailed bug list here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SPFy8Hug01hiWCx_dPLeDi5donyrAghp8ZQ783drnmE/edit?usp=sharing

🎮 Get Involved:
Don't miss your chance to join future playtests and be a part of the development journey of Abyss. Your feedback is crucial in helping us create a more stable and enjoyable gaming experience for everyone!
